description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dive into this rhythm-based rail shooter and track down an artificial being born in an isolated network.  As the music drives you and you will drive it.  Feel the pulse as every action is represented through rhythm, visuals, and rumble feedback.  Straddle the analog and digital worlds to prevent the artificial life-form from gaining control.
description.short: Dive into this rhythm-based rail shooter and track down an artificial being born in an isolated network.  As the music drives you and you will drive it.  Feel the pulse as every action is represented through rhythm, visuals, and rumble feedback.  Straddle the analog and digital worlds to prevent the artificial life-form from gaining control.
